meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slushy.
meanings.sent1: The slushiness of the snow made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: I don't like the slushiness of the muddy puddles.
meanings.sent3: The slushiness of the ice cream made it melt too quickly.
meanings.sent4: The slushiness of the slushie reminded me of a melting snowman.
meanings.sent5: The slushiness of the slush made it refreshing on a hot day.

meanings.sent3: The slushiness of the smoothie made it a perfect treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The slushiness of the mud made it hard to walk through the field.
